content: this easy modern baby blanket knitting pattern creates a stunning fabric of diagonal seed stitch stripes on a stockinette stitch background if you re a new knitter then you ll be happy to hear that the pattern only requires that you can knit and purl - no other special techniques required and since this blanket is knit with a worsted weight yarn it builds up quickly too **materials ** to make one blanket -5 skeins 1090 yards knit picks brava tweed worsted weight yarn colour heron -us size 10/6mm circular knitting needles 32 cord -scissors -tapestry/yarn needle for weaving in ends **skill level ** beginner **finished blanket measures ** 37 wide x 46 long
